direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods construct a string representation of the Option object, with toDeprecatedString focusing on deprecated attributes.

Both methods return a string representation, with getOpt returning the short name of the option.
Both methods return a string representation, with getLongOpt returning the long name of the option.
Both methods return a string representation, with getSince returning the version when the option was added.
